text: Jisua'n a bôksa nôka, “Masikin nangni ki ril, Pathien Rêngram hih nin kôm renga lâkpai nîng ata, amara musuo rang mingei kôm pêk nîng atih. 21:43 Miziek senkharngei chu archang 44 na an bôksa: Tutu hi lung chunga inpal chu ahârhârin om an ta; male hi lungin adel vang chu innôichit an tih Luk 20:18 en roh.
